H3.text: when did the united states acquired puerto rico. 1898

A4.text: In 1898, following the Spanish–American War, Puerto Rico was acquired by the United States.

A5.text: In 1898, during the Spanish–American War, Puerto Rico was invaded and subsequently became a possession of the U.S.
